lines.text: You carry a UB-21 Schnauzer with a Gnab silencer. That's KGB. You prefer an H&K over an A.K. Your surveillance technique is NSA. Your ID is CIA. You received your Ph.D. at NYU. Traded in your GTO for a BMV. You listen to CDs by R.E.M. and STP. And you'd like to see J.F.K. in his BVDs, getting down with O.P.P. And you probably put the toilet paper back on the roll with the paper on the inside.
[about to infiltrate Kikiree Island]
I'm going in there.
That's crazy!
No, crazy is walking down the street with half a cantaloupe on your head, muttering "I'm a hamster, I'm a hamster."
Good God! He must be stopped!
Dick Steele couldn't stop me fifteen years ago, and all the Dicks you got won't stop me now!
Well, apparently he hasn't, uh, seen the size of some of our newer members!
Have a nice flight, and I wish you adieus
Thank you, but I am quite satisfied with the do I have.
Sir, we have intercepted a disturbing video on the rock of gabraltar.
Well, what is it?
It's this really big rock sticking out of the water on the south coast of Spain.

[to Rancor]
I'd shake your hand, but I don't know where it landed
[Two thugs are dragging McCluckey up some stairs, hitting his head on every step]
That's for Getting Even With Dad. And that's for My Girl. And that's for My Girl 2.
I wasn't even in My Girl 2!
We don't care!

[driving the bus]
Next stop, Sunset Boulevard! I guess it's Sunset Boulevard.
Operator, get me Washington.
George?
D.C.
Do you have lighter?
I only use matches.
Does your mother know you smoke?
Yes. But I don't inhale.
Kabul
[Steele gives him puzzled look]
I'm Kabul
